feature_model.name: PizzaModel
feature_model.feature_tree: :r Pizza(_r) :m Topping(_r_1) :o Salami(_r_1_2) :o Ham(_r_1_3) :o Mozzarelle(_r_1_4) :m Size(_r_5) :g (_r_5_7) [1,1] : Normal(_r_5_7_8) : Big(_r_5_7_9) :m Dough(_r_12) :g (_r_12_13) [1,1] : Neapolitan(_r_12_13_14) : Sicilian(_r_12_13_15) :o CheesyCrust(_r_16)
